trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around June 17th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my balcony on a clear June night around dusk, but still pleantly of light in the sky. I walked out on my 3rd story appartment balcony to enjoy a cigarette, and my eyes were immediatley drawn to the horizon to the east, where I saw a huge dark object, like a cigar laying horizontally, and it seemed to slowly float, it was more like a bouncing or skipping, but it almost seemed to move in slow motion. I've never seen anything move like that in my life. I yelled for my girlfriend and my 7 year old son to come outside and look to make sure I was seeing what I was seeing, they were both stunned and had no idea what it could have been. We were watching it float from north to south togeather for about 1 minute, and then it dissapeared. Literally just dissapeared. No lights turned on, nothing. It was there, plain as day, then it was gone. I called Eppley Airfield & the local police station to ask them if anyone had reported seeing anything strange in the sky, because I had, and the operator snickered and told me no. What I saw was like nothing I've ever seen, and I hope everyone gets a chance some day to have the same experience. It was very exciting, it made me feel like a giddy little kid. Now that I have seen one, its very frustrating to me how people just laugh it off. Even when a report is so credible that it makes it to the evening news, EVERY time, the anchorpeople laugh it up & don't take it seriously causing the people watching not to take it seriouly.
